label: Puissant, Stéphane & Young J. Lee.  2016. Description of a new species of the genus Hyalessa China (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Sonatini) from Yunnan, China, with a key to the species of Hyalessa and a calling song analysis for two Hyalessa species. Zootaxa 4114(4): 434–446.
value: Puissant, Stéphane & Young J. Lee.  2016. Description of a new species of the genus Hyalessa China (Hemiptera: Cicadidae: Sonatini) from Yunnan, China, with a key to the species of Hyalessa and a calling song analysis for two Hyalessa species. Zootaxa 4114(4): 434–446.
